title: CLONE - AutoscalingHistoryHandlerTest fails frequently
description:
This test fails frequently on jenkins with a failed assertion (see also SOLR-11378 for other failure mode):

   [junit4] FAILURE 6.49s J2 | AutoscalingHistoryHandlerTest.testHistory <<<
   [junit4]    > Throwable #1: java.lang.AssertionError: expected:<8> but was:<6>
   [junit4]    > 	at __randomizedtesting.SeedInfo.seed([164F10BB7F145FDE:7BB3B446C55CA0D9]:0)
   [junit4]    > 	at org.apache.solr.handler.admin.AutoscalingHistoryHandlerTest.testHistory(AutoscalingHistoryHandlerTest.java:194)
   [junit4]    > 	at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:748)
